bigsignwriter.config.buttonsX.desc: Horizontal offset for mod buttons, from center of screen.
bigsignwriter.config.buttonsY.desc: Vertical offset for mod buttons, from center of screen.
bigsignwriter.config.buttonsAlignmentX.d: Horizontal screen alignment for mod buttons (0%: left, 100%: right)
bigsignwriter.config.buttonsAlignmentY.d: Vertical screen alignment for mod buttons (0%: top, 100%: bottom)
bigsignwriter.config.defaultCharacterSep: Default separator string to place between characters. May be overridden by fonts.
